data.convo: Mom , you know that Andrea and I sometimes worry about you . Really ? Why would you worry about me ? I ’ m just fine . You ’ re almost 70 years old , Mom ! Don ’ t you think it would be better for you if you moved in with us ? No way ! I like my apartment , and I like to be independent . Do you ever get lonely living alone ? Not at all . I see you and your family twice a week , and I enjoy seeing my own friends . I ’ m too busy to feel lonely !
